mainBoard.name: Into the Roil
mainBoard.originalText:
Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

rulings.text: If the targeted permanent is an illegal target by the time Into the Roil resolves, the entire spell doesn't resolve. You don't draw a card.
If the target nonland permanent is an illegal target by the time Into the Roil tries to resolve, the spell doesn't resolve. You don't draw a card if it was kicked.
If a card or token enters as a copy of a permanent, the new permanent isn't kicked, even if the original was.
If a spell's kicker cost was paid, the spell is "kicked."
If you copy a kicked spell on the stack, the copy is also kicked. If the copied spell is a permanent spell, the token the copy of that spell becomes when it enters is also kicked.
If you put a permanent with a kicker ability onto the battlefield without casting it, you can't kick it.
The kicker ability doesn't let you pay a kicker cost more than once.

To determine a spell's total cost, start with the mana cost (or an alternative cost if another card's effect allows you to pay one instead), add any cost increases (such as kicker), then apply any cost reductions. The spell's mana value remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

mainBoard.text:

foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura.
Cuando esta Aura entre, gira la criatura encantada.
La criatura encantada no se endereza durante el paso de enderezar de su controlador.

foreignData.name: Collet de lumière stellaire
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : créature
Quand cette aura arrive, engagez la créature enchantée.
La créature enchantée ne se dégage pas pendant l'étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.

foreignData.name: Trappola di Luce Stellare
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura
Quando quest'Aura entra, TAPpa la creatura incantata.
La creatura incantata non STAPpa durante lo STAP del suo controllore.

foreignData.name: 星明かりの罠
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
このオーラが戦場に出たとき、エンチャントしているクリーチャーをタップする。
エンチャントしているクリーチャーは、それのコントローラーのアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

mainBoard.name: Starlight Snare
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature
When this Aura enters, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
When this Aura enters, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"There are lands beyond Valley. Wild, calamity-scarred, and beautiful."
—Farfeather, birdfolk scout

foreignData.flavorText:
„Es gibt Gebiete jenseits von Thal. Wild, von Unheil gezeichnet und wunderschön."
—Fernfeder, Späher des Vogelvolks
foreignData.name: Unerforschter Zufluchtsort
foreignData.text:
Dieses Land kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie es ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe.
{T}: Erzeuge ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Hay tierras más allá de Vallis. Salvajes, asoladas por la calamidad y bellas".
—Plumayente, exploradora pajarina
foreignData.name: Refugio inexplorado
foreignData.text:
Esta tierra entra girada. En cuanto entre, elige un color.
{T}: Agrega un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Il existe des terres par-delà Vallée. Sauvages, meurtries par la calamité, et magnifiques. »
—Plumeloin, éclaireur passerain
foreignData.name: Havre inexploré
foreignData.text:
Ce terrain arrive engagé. Au moment où il arrive, choisissez une couleur.
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Oltre la Valle ci sono altre terre. Selvagge, segnate dalle calamità e meravigliose."
—Lungapiuma, esploratore avianide
foreignData.name: Oasi Inesplorata
foreignData.text:
Questa terra entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore.
{T}: Aggiungi un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText:
「渓間の向こうにも大地が広がっている。そこは荒れ果て、災厄の傷跡生々しく、美しい。」
――バードフォークの偵察員、遠羽
foreignData.name: 未知なる安息地
foreignData.text:
この土地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

mainBoard.name: Uncharted Haven
mainBoard.originalText:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

rulings.text: If Uncharted Haven is somehow on the battlefield without a chosen color, its mana ability won't make any mana.

mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.
